title: Double Cloth, "Puffed Blocks", 1979
medium:
Medium: cotton, polyester
Technique: two intercrossed plain weave structures (double cloth) with selective shrinking
description: Length of off-white fabric with puckered squares separated by a grid of ribbed lines, forming a plaid effect.
